Atty. Leni Robredo: Jesse would say, sobra-sobra na ito. Thank you  from the bottom of our hearts. #salamatjesse
Atty. Leni Robredo: Maybe for him, it was the perfect end for a life well-lived.
Atty. Leni Robredo: He was always working hard, but at the same time always rushing home to be with his family. #salamatjesse

Lahat ng kagandahan at kabutihan na ipinunla ni Jesse ay buo at tunay na mapipitas. #salamatjesse
Last minute: at this moment, the fire in the 200 tank of Amuay has been extinguished!
Paalam Jesse, sa ngalan ng sambayanan, Maraming maraming Salamat. #salamatjesse
And the work of extinguishing the fire in tank 203, advance by 75%! And we continue with our heroic firefighters of PDVSA fighting!
I am now talking with the Min.RafaelRamírez, who is a few meters away from the aforementioned tanks, commanding the operations!
Now we will concentrate on tank 204, to completely extinguish the fire! With God's favor, we will get ahead!
